short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A to-do list with a simple interface for all your task tracking needs while using Chrome.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A very basic to-do list that allows you to add items, delete them, come back to them later .. whatever helps you organize your tasks best!
